thread.title: #GiveTwitterASlogan: how would you define the social network in 140 characters?
thread.title_full: #GiveTwitterASlogan: how would you define the social network in 140 characters? | Technology | The Guardian

author: Hannah Jane Parkinson
title: #GiveTwitterASlogan: how would you define the social network in 140 characters?
text:
Twitter trending hashtags: a chance to show how witty you can be with the remaining characters left. Today, a particular meta hashtag is doing the rounds – #GiveTwitterASlogan . But what is Twitter to you? We’ve rounded up some of our favourite examples, and now we’re opening it up. Leave your comments in the #thread #below.
— Michael Baggs (@Baggsy) October 13, 2015 A cool place to tell strangers about your medical history #GiveTwitterASlogan
— Jeffrey Galperin (@JeffGalperin) October 13, 2015 #GiveTwitterASlogan The tree that falls in the forest when no one is around. pic.twitter.com/uWlrOSxCMA
— Greg Jenner (@greg_jenner) October 13, 2015 #GiveTwitterASlogan Someone did that joke already
— Leah Wall (@LeahMWall) October 13, 2015 Twitter. One edit button away from a good time! #GiveTwitterASlogan
— Duke Silver (@dribblingfram) October 13, 2015 If it's not worth saying, put it on Twitter. #GiveTwitterASlogan
— Amanda (@Pandamoanimum) October 13, 2015 #GiveTwitterASlogan Want complete strangers to explain jokes to you and correct your grammar? Then we’ve got just the place for you!
— laura (@lauravstheworld) October 13, 2015 #GiveTwitterASlogan : "Facebook is full of people you know and don't like. Twitter is full of people you like and don't know."
— Sarah Morgan (@sarahlmorgan) October 13, 2015 Because you're already on the toilet #GiveTwitterASlogan
— Gordon MacMillan (@gordonmacmillan) October 13, 2015 The revolution will be Tweeted #GiveTwitterASlogan pic.twitter.com/rIae5pJ7ut
— Grace Mitri (@thot_catalogue) October 13, 2015 The place for Facebook statuses you don't want your relatives to see. #GiveTwitterASlogan
— Jordan Roberts (@Jordawr) October 13, 2015 #GiveTwitterASlogan Home of sarcastic retweets and Peirs Morgan.
— Rabeeya (@HedwigRabeeya) October 13, 2015 Replacing productivity since 2006! #GiveTwitterASlogan
— Em Baker (@therealembaker) October 13, 2015 People you were afraid existed, all in one place! #GiveTwitterASlogan pic.twitter.com/SbXIKs9WD6
— Dean Burnett (@garwboy) October 13, 2015 #GiveTwitterASlogan Because you haven't lived until an egg has called you a cunt
